title: incredibly slow download speed but my internet is fast
body:
http://imgur.com/a/OFjZ1

http://imgur.com/a/LKM8B

what is going on jesus christ lol

replies.body:
Patching speed is determined by a ton of factors, and while your test speed for your net may be quick, every server is located in a different geolocation. Beyond distance, ISP routing to each server looks different, and will have a different effect on your speeds and experience with that server. 

If you encounter issues with being able to successfully patch, please let me know and I'll be happy to help.
